com.quantcomponents.core.model
Class BareDate

java.lang.Object
  com.quantcomponents.core.model.BareDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<BareDate>
public class BareDate
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<BareDate>

Simpler date class used throughout the framework in place of Date or Date. This class is used whenever there is a need for a bare date, with no time or timezone information: e.g. contract expiration date.

See Also:
